name: Tiny Caveman
description:
This game was made for the DinoJam 1 and it is a beat-em-up inspired by "Black Belt" where you are a caveman trying to fight a horde of dinosaurs.

For now, the current version (0.1) is mostly a tech demo with placeholder graphics, only partially implemented moveset and no win/lose condition.

This game is distributed as a Sega Master System ROM; you will need to either use an emulator (Emulicious was mostly used during testing, but most emulators should work) or real hardware (untested, but should work).

Github repo: https://github.com/haroldo-ok/tiny-caveman
